stripped_text: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.
text: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.
title: Muse
